name: Siegebreaker
description:
Siegebreaker brings unparalleled strategic depth to the genre with new mechanics, gameplay, and level design. Discover over 40 unique upgrades and enhancements, and combine them to create novel builds and strategies.

Towers can gain abilities, significantly altering their behavior. Strategize tower and ability placement to leverage synergies between your towers.

Enemies can attack and damage your towers — and even destroy them. Balance your offensive and defensive capabilities to keep your towers protected.

Randomized progression requires you to strategize with the hand you are dealt, and ensures no two playthroughs will be the same.

Explore over two dozen levels, each designed to provide a unique challenge. Progress through the forests of Aethryn, deserts of Eranakis, frozen peaks of Haedmyr, and hellfire of Bal'Volar.
